body_html:
I am able to reproduce this issue with the following snippet:

import torch
a = torch.randn(1000,1000)
q,r = torch.qr(a)
m,tau = torch.geqrf(a)
a_qr = torch.orgqr(m,tau)
m_triu = torch.triu(m)
y = float(max(max(x) for x in q - a_qr))
z = float(max(max(x) for x in r - m_triu))

print("Q max diff = {0:.6f}{1}".format(y, " FAIL!" if y > 0.001 else ""))
print("R max diff = {0:.6f}{1}".format(z, " FAIL!" if z > 0.001 else ""))

body:
I am able to reproduce this issue with the following snippet:

```
import torch
a = torch.randn(1000,1000)
q,r = torch.qr(a)
m,tau = torch.geqrf(a)
a_qr = torch.orgqr(m,tau)
m_triu = torch.triu(m)
y = float(max(max(x) for x in q - a_qr))
z = float(max(max(x) for x in r - m_triu))

print("Q max diff = {0:.6f}{1}".format(y, " FAIL!" if y > 0.001 else ""))
print("R max diff = {0:.6f}{1}".format(z, " FAIL!" if z > 0.001 else ""))
```
